      • formOctave

        public boolean formOctave(utilities.NoteADT note)
        Description copied from class: utilities.NoteADT
        Observer method returns true if the current note forms an octave with another note (if this note is 12 half steps above or 12 half steps below the other note). Preconditions: A valid NoteADT object exists and a valid NoteADT object is passed in. Postconditions: True is returned if the two notes are exactly 12 half steps apart.
        Specified by:
        formOctave in class utilities.NoteADT
        Parameters:
        note - The other note
        Returns:
        True if the two notes form an octave, false otherwise
        See Also:
        NoteADT.formOctave(NoteADT)

      • modifyNoteByHalfSteps

        public void modifyNoteByHalfSteps(int numberOfHalfSteps)
                           throws exceptions.InvalidNoteException
        Description copied from class: utilities.NoteADT
        Mutator method that raises or lowers the pitch (note) by any number of half steps. Preconditions: A valid NoteADT object exists and an integer value representing the number of half steps is supplied. Postconditions: The MIDI value of note is increased or decreased by the number of the half steps passed into the method.
        Specified by:
        modifyNoteByHalfSteps in class utilities.NoteADT
        Parameters:
        numberOfHalfSteps - used to raise or lower the note MIDI value
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidNoteException - if resulting note has a MIDI value (after being modified) outside of the valid range of 0 to 127
        See Also:
        NoteADT.modifyNoteByHalfSteps(int)
